attributes.action: Grant PSV license holders, class2 licence to help deliver goods during covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: It makes a lot of sense and you need deliver driver more now and lost of psv drivers are out of work or been laid off
attributes.background: Psv licence holder drive much larger and heavier vehicles, with the worlds most vital cargo, HUMANS!!! So grant them class 2 entitlement to be able to help deliver goods whilst most psv drivers are out of work

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306835

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
